articles.title: Ursula von der Leyen demands EU military integration and boots on the ground - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: European Commission president said it was time to take Europe to "the next level" and act independently of NATO
articles.content:
The European Union must step up to the next level and send soldiers to the worlds conflict zones, Ursula von der Leyen said in her most forthright call for military integration to date.
The European… [+2360 chars]

articles.title: European stocks under pressure from weak China data - Reuters
articles.description: European shares slipped on Wednesday as worries about a slowing Chinese economy, declines in travel and leisure stocks and soaring UK inflation dampened sentiment in early trading.
articles.content:

articles.author: Owen Conlon, John Hand
articles.title: Gardai arrest terror suspect hiding in plain sight in Ireland for 22 years - Irish Mirror
articles.description: EXCLUSIVE: The Algerian national was hiding here from European police forces for over 22 years
articles.content:
An Islamic terror suspect wanted in europe for more than two decades has been arrested in Ireland, we can reveal.
Abderrahmane Yahiaoui, in his early 50s, was hiding here from European police forces… [+1968 chars]

articles.author: Sporting News
articles.title: Barcelona's sad new reality: Bayern Munich prove Catalans can no longer compete with Europe's elite - Goal.com
articles.description: Paulo Dybala revealed that he is expecting to resume negotiations with Juventus over a new contract after leading the Italian giants to a comfortable Champions League win on Tuesday.
